tva:BasicDescription.tva:Title: Pirates of the Caribbean: On Strange Tides - Trailer 1
tva:BasicDescription.tva:Synopsis:
Now available on Disney Blu-ray™ Combo Pack / Blu-ray 3D and Movie Download: http://di.sn/AP
Official Site: http://disney.com/Pirates
Like us on Facebook: http://facebook.com/PiratesoftheCaribbean
Follow us on Twitter: http://twitter.com/DisneyPirates
Johnny Depp returns to his iconic role of Captain Jack Sparrow in an action-packed tale of truth, betrayal, youth and demise. When Jack crosses paths with a woman from his past (Penélope Cruz), he's not sure if it's love—or if she's a ruthless con artist who's using him to find the fabled Fountain of Youth. When she forces him aboard the Queen Anne's Revenge, the ship of the formidable pirate Blackbeard (Ian McShane), Jack finds himself on an unexpected adventure in which he doesn't know who to fear more: Blackbeard or the woman from his past.

tva:Genre.tva:Name: Non-linear audio-video
tva:Genre.tva:Definition: Services where the interaction is based mostly around choosing alternate audio or video files - VOD and AOD, maybe combined with 2.1.1.15 (multi stream)

tva:HowRelated.tva:Name: Recommendation
tva:HowRelated.tva:Definition: The reference points to a resource recommended the provider of the current resource. The service provider considers there to be similarities between the currently described resource and the referenced resource. Example: This could provide access to previous or next episodes or to all episodes (the parent series as a whole). Suggestion to record a programme which the broadcaster recommends because of what the user is watching.It could also point to a Web site proposing related programmes ‘recommended’ by the service provider. A recommendation can be used to suggest content or services or services bundles with a similar subject.

tva:Review.tva:FreeTextReview: Love IT!﻿ What time does it come out on DVD? :D
CHANGE YOUR FACEBOOK LANGUAGE TO ﻿ ENGLISH (PIRATE) HAHAH AWESOME
ian﻿ mcshane looks like gangplank LOL :P
i want the song of the trailer, as it is, i mean the exact one,﻿ not the songs they used, anyone knows where to find it??
Such a great film just﻿ saw it tonight!..
I just bought all 4 movies and Lego Pirates of the caribbean on xbox﻿ 360
My boyfriend <3﻿

i loved the part with the mermaid and the religious guy i am as happy as hell that they had their happy end to
and because i come from the netherlands i am going to say the next text in every comment during the next 3 days
RIP pilot﻿ of the f16 royal netherlands airforce 2011
awesome ﻿
so much focus on Jack compared to the original pirates of the caribbean movie ..﻿
how come ALL the comments has thumbs up﻿ on? :S
My﻿ dad just bought all 4 movies!
I luv﻿ this film
Crappiest movie in the series. Should have kept﻿ Gore Verbinski as the director.

Despite thet fact that this has a different feel than the other three, just hearing the theme (He's A Pirate) and the other music makes me smile... I'm﻿ glad to be a part of the generation where pirates are cool :)
best movie yeah like it﻿ much!
I support is missionaries﻿ position!
Thumbs up if you've already watched the movie but still watch the trailer!﻿
Why all the comments﻿ have so much likes? xD
Thumbs up for the hot﻿ mermaids!!
i want to know what happend to the cute guy and the mermaid.... when he goes with﻿ her he die?????
amazing movie! 5/5! for sure﻿
Great to see Johnny back as Jack the story worked in lots of areas and felt flat in others. Ian Mcshane was﻿ great as Blackbeard.

"Did anyone see that, becaus i'm NOT﻿ be doing that again"
hahaha :D
glad i﻿ saw this in 3D very good movie and ... er... there should be a captain in there somewhere :)

Reviewer.Books: My favorite book is : Death note another note : the los angeles BB murder cases ...
Reviewer.Movies: my favorite movies are HSM 1 , 2 and soon 3... My favorite shows are : Hannah montana , The suite life of zack and cody , Thats so raven , cory in the house , wizards of waverly place , phinus and ferb ,
Reviewer.Music: Favorite music is HSM , Camp Rock , ALy and Aj ( mwhuhaha ) , Jonas Brothers , The veronicas , Rihanna , Kat deluna , Miley cyrus , and other disney stuff

Reviewer.Music: I like Rianna, Katy perry ,Jessie J,Lady gaga,Abba,Queen,Snap attack,Black eyed peas,Beyonce,Pink,U2,Olie Murs,Take that and plan b.,LMFAO!Coldplay,snow pratrol,Buno mars,cold play, I like almost eveything but, not Justin Bibber!
